name: Pat-A-Cat
description:
Submission for Extra Credits Game Jam #6

Take Care to approach cats with ARROW KEYS.
Press SPACE to kneel and contextually pat cats.

Additional Assets used:
CAT MENU IMAGE - by chris panas - https://unsplash.com/@chrispanas
BARIKA FONT - by Faras Dina - https://www.dafont.com/profile.php?user=1095950
BACKGROUND MUSIC "coppycat" by - Syndcopika - https://opengameart.org/content/copycat
Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com
